scenario.title: Chat icon global header
scenario.step: Given user is on the OCOM page
When the page loads
Then chat icon must appear in global header

scenario.title: Chat icon side wall
scenario.step: Given user is on the OCOM page
When the page loads
Then chat icon must appear on the side wall

scenario.title: Start chat with agent from proactive chat window
scenario.step: Given user is on the OCOM page
When proactive chat appears
Then user clicks on start chat button
Then chat form must open

scenario.title: Close proactive chat window
scenario.step: Given user is on the OCOM page
When proactive chat appears
Then user clicks x
Then chat form must not open

scenario.title: Chat options
scenario.step: Given user is on the OCOM page
When the user clicks on the chat icon
Then modal must show chat options

scenario.title: Start the chat with an agent
scenario.step: Given user opened chat modal on OCOM page
When the user clicks on CTA link
Then chat forms must open

scenario.title: Start a chat with an agent
scenario.step: Given user opened chat modal on OCOM page
When the user click on CTA link
Then support options page must open

scenario.title: Chat form field
scenario.step: Given user clicked start chat
When chat form opens
Then user must view form fields

scenario.title: Browser page
scenario.step: Given user opened chat form
When user browsers the website
Then chat form must not close
